00222 inline CartesianVector::CartesianVector(float x, float y, float z) :
00223     m_x(x),
00224     m_y(y),
00225     m_z(z)
00226 {
00227 }

00231 inline CartesianVector::CartesianVector(const CartesianVector &rhs) :
00232     m_x(rhs.m_x),
00233     m_y(rhs.m_y),
00234     m_z(rhs.m_z)
00235 {
00236 }

00238 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00240 inline void CartesianVector::SetValues(float x, float y, float z)
00241 {
00242     m_x = x;
00243     m_y = y;
00244     m_z = z;
00245 }

00247 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00248 
00249 inline float CartesianVector::GetX() const
00250 {
00251     return m_x;
00252 }
00253 
00254 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00255 
00256 inline float CartesianVector::GetY() const
00257 {
00258     return m_y;
00259 }
00260 
00261 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00262 
00263 inline float CartesianVector::GetZ() const
00264 {
00265     return m_z;
00266 }

00268 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00269 
00270 inline float CartesianVector::GetMagnitude() const
00271 {
00272     return std::sqrt(this->GetMagnitudeSquared());
00273 }
00274 
00275 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00276 
00277 inline float CartesianVector::GetMagnitudeSquared() const
00278 {
00279     return ((m_x * m_x) + (m_y * m_y) + (m_z * m_z));
00280 }
00281 
00282 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00283 
00284 inline float CartesianVector::GetDotProduct(const CartesianVector &rhs) const
00285 {
00286     return ((m_x * rhs.m_x) + (m_y * rhs.m_y) + (m_z * rhs.m_z));
00287 }
00288 
00289 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00290 
00291 inline CartesianVector CartesianVector::GetCrossProduct(const CartesianVector &rhs) const
00292 {
00293     return CartesianVector( (m_y * rhs.m_z) - (rhs.m_y * m_z),
00294                             (m_z * rhs.m_x) - (rhs.m_z * m_x),
00295                             (m_x * rhs.m_y) - (rhs.m_x * m_y));
00296 }
00297 
00298 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00299 
00300 inline float CartesianVector::GetOpeningAngle(const CartesianVector &rhs) const
00301 {
00302     return std::acos(this->GetCosOpeningAngle(rhs));
00303 }
00304

00307 inline CartesianVector &CartesianVector::operator=(const CartesianVector &rhs)
00308 {
00309     this->SetValues(rhs.m_x, rhs.m_y, rhs.m_z);
00310     return *this;
00311 }
00312 
00313 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00314 
00315 inline CartesianVector &CartesianVector::operator+=(const CartesianVector &rhs)
00316 {
00317     this->SetValues(m_x + rhs.m_x, m_y + rhs.m_y, m_z + rhs.m_z);
00318     return *this;
00319 }
00320 
00321 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00322 
00323 inline CartesianVector &CartesianVector::operator-=(const CartesianVector &rhs)
00324 {
00325     this->SetValues(m_x - rhs.m_x, m_y - rhs.m_y, m_z - rhs.m_z);
00326     return *this;
00327 }
00328 
00329 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00330 
00331 inline CartesianVector &CartesianVector::operator*=(const double scalar)
00332 {
00333     this->SetValues(static_cast<float>(m_x * scalar), static_cast<float>(m_y * scalar), static_cast<float>(m_z * scalar));
00334     return *this;
00335 }
00336 
00337 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00338 
00339 inline bool CartesianVector::operator==(const CartesianVector &rhs) const
00340 {
00341     return ( (std::fabs(m_x - rhs.m_x) < std::numeric_limits<float>::epsilon()) &&
00342         (std::fabs(m_y - rhs.m_y) < std::numeric_limits<float>::epsilon()) &&
00343         (std::fabs(m_z - rhs.m_z) < std::numeric_limits<float>::epsilon()) );
00344 }
00345

00347 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00348 
00349 inline CartesianVector operator+(const CartesianVector &lhs, const CartesianVector &rhs)
00350 {
00351     return CartesianVector(lhs.GetX() + rhs.GetX(), lhs.GetY() + rhs.GetY(), lhs.GetZ() + rhs.GetZ());
00352 }
00353 
00354 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00355 
00356 inline CartesianVector operator-(const CartesianVector &lhs, const CartesianVector &rhs)
00357 {
00358     return CartesianVector(lhs.GetX() - rhs.GetX(), lhs.GetY() - rhs.GetY(), lhs.GetZ() - rhs.GetZ());
00359 }
00360 
00361 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00362 
00363 inline CartesianVector operator*(const CartesianVector &lhs, const double scalar)
00364 {
00365     return CartesianVector(static_cast<float>(lhs.GetX() * scalar), static_cast<float>(lhs.GetY() * scalar), static_cast<float>(lhs.GetZ() * scalar));
00366 }
